title: Relax CR ID requirement in revision_summary

comment: Section 5.2 (SOP-002 Section 8 Update) is underspecified. It states 'Reframe the section as guidance rather than a hard requirement' but does not provide the exact replacement text. Section 5.1 correctly provides the complete 'Change from X to Y' specification for SOP-001. Section 5.2 must follow the same pattern: provide the full current text of SOP-002 Section 8 and the full proposed replacement text. Without this, the implementer must make design decisions during execution that should be reviewed and approved as part of the pre-approved content.

Re-review complete. Previous finding resolved: Section 5.2 now provides complete before/after text for SOP-002 Section 8, matching the specification pattern in Section 5.1. All review criteria verified: (1) Frontmatter title: 'Relax CR ID requirement in revision_summary'; (2) Frontmatter revision_summary: 'Initial draft' (acceptable for v0.x); (3) All 12 required CR sections present and complete; (4) No placeholder content in pre-approved sections 1-9; (5) Consistent formatting throughout; (6) Files Affected matches Impact Assessment (8 files); (7) EI table covers all implementation tasks. Document is ready for pre-approval.

Post-review verification complete per SOP-002 Section 7.3. Verified: (1) All 7 EIs have Task Outcome of Pass - no failed items requiring VARs; (2) SOP-001 v17.0 EFFECTIVE, SOP-002 v7.0 EFFECTIVE - confirmed via qms status; (3) Evidence documented in all execution summaries with version numbers and completion details; (4) revision_summary in both SOPs references CR-033 per traceability requirements. All post-review conditions satisfied.
